ygData.subject: Re: Negotiated private cache storage allocation
ygData.msgSnippet: I m a little uncomfortable calling this negotiation ; the model I have in mind is that a site might request a larger allocation than the default, and the UA

I'm a little uncomfortable calling this "negotiation"; the model I have in =
mind is that a site might request a larger allocation than the default, and=
 the UA would ask the user (or possibly, the user would pre-configure to ac=
cept or deny). Wherever possible, though, the browser should probably use a=
 heuristic, to keep it simple (From a UX perspective).

Cheers,
